refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: mdaqPWMWrite(module, dutyChannelA, dutyChannelB) mdaqPWMWrite(linkID, module, dutyChannelA, dutyChannelB)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function sets PWM waveform duty for A and B channels for selected PWM module. PWM module has to be initiated with mdaqPWMInit
